ModMetaData.name: CTB-AT Equipment Expanded
ModMetaData.author: azrazalea (originally by Aos Si)
ModMetaData.description:
Enhanced compatibility bridge between Colonist Tech Background and Arcane Technology with comprehensive mod support including Medieval Overhaul, Simple Sidearms, and These are Spacer Tech compatibility.
Note: This mod replaces Arcane Technology's Simple Sidearms patch to provide enhanced tech background integration. Pawns with appropriate tech backgrounds can now use research-locked weapons as sidearms without requiring research.
